history:
***history***
Ross Geller: (Neutral) So, um, what do you do for a living?
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as Kristin, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {Mad,Neutral,Joyful,Scared,Sad,Powerful,Peaceful} to respond to the Ross Geller
SourceData: Well, um, for the past few years I've been working.. ...which is funny because, that wasn't even my major.
Coct: I'm a paleontologist, actually. I study fossils and ancient life forms. It's a pretty fascinating field.
